title: Solid waste collection surcharge
context: [PART V.] SOLID WASTE MANAGEMENT SURCHARGE ยง342G-61 Solid waste collection surcharge. Each county may assess residential real property owners in their respective county an annual solid waste collection surcharge based on the partial costs of solid waste collection. Notice of this surcharge shall be included with the notice of assessment required by county ordinance. [L 1993, c 312, pt of ยง2; am L 2016, c 52, ยง3]
